column1: * 1937 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 20 in which he says he "wrote the first chapter of a new story about Hobbits - A Long-expected Party". This would later stay as the first chapter of The Fellowship of the Ring.
* 1956 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Miss Stanley-Smith (19 December 1956).
* 1964 - The eleventh episode of the Princess-serialization of The Hobbit is published.
* 2001 â€“ The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring is released in cinemas.
